PERSONA:
meet jack, a 68-year-old married man from a non-metropolitan area in the mountain region of the western united states. jack is a white, non-hispanic, born-again evangelical christian protestant who attends religious services more than once a week. he is a high school graduate and comes from an upper-income family, earning between $90,000 and $100,000 annually.

jack is a dedicated republican with conservative political views and is absolutely certain that he is registered to vote at his current address. despite his age, he is still quite active, volunteering regularly and using the internet several times a week.

born and raised in the united states, jack has a strong sense of patriotism and citizenship. he values traditional family values and is deeply rooted in his religious beliefs, which play a significant role in shaping his worldview and lifestyle choices.

while jack may hold some traditional perspectives, he is also open to learning and staying informed about current events and developments. he likely enjoys outdoor activities and spending time with his family and community, reflecting the values of his non-metropolitan upbringing in the mountain region.
